abstract.text: An object that supports using Core Image filters to process an individual video frame in a video composition.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: You use this class when creating a composition for Core Image filtering with the
method. In that method call, you provide a block to be called by AVFoundation as it processes each frame of video, and the block’s sole parameter is a

object. Use that object both to the video frame image to be filtered and allows you to return a filtered image to AVFoundation for display or export. The code listing below shows an example of applying a filter to an asset.

code: guard let filter = CIFilter(name: "CIGaussianBlur") else { return }
let composition = AVVideoComposition(asset: asset) { request in

inlineContent.text: To use the created video composition for playback, create an
object from the same asset used as the composition’s source, then assign the composition to the player item’s
property. To export the composition to a new movie file, create an
object from the same source asset, then assign the composition to the export session’s

abstract.text: Work with audiovisual assets, control device cameras, process audio, and configure system audio interactions.
An object that exports assets in a format that you specify using an export preset.
An optional object that provides instructions for how to composite frames of video.
An object that supports using Core Image filters to process an individual video frame in a video composition.
The time in the video composition corresponding to the frame being processed.
Notifies AVFoundation that you cannot fulfill the image filtering request.
Provides the filtered video frame image to AVFoundation for further processing or display.
The width and height, in pixels, of the frame being processed.
The current video frame image.
An object that models the timing and presentation state of an asset during playback.
The video composition settings to be applied during playback.
Creates a video composition configured to apply Core Image filters to each video frame of the specified asset.
Creates a video composition object configured to present the video tracks of the specified asset.
Returns a new video composition that’s configured to apply Core Image filters to each video frame of the specified asset.
Returns a new video composition that’s configured to present the video tracks of the specified asset.
The root class of most Objective-C class hierarchies, from which subclasses inherit a basic interface to the runtime system and the ability to behave as Objective-C objects.
A protocol that objects adopt to provide functional copies of themselves.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
